title: Japan’s Nikkei Stock Adds to Weekly Gain with Eyes on Central Bank Meetings (UPDATE 1)
description:

The Tokyo Stock Exchange

TOKYO, Nov 28 (Reuters) – Japan’s Nikkei share average added to a weekly advance on Friday as investor attention turned towards major central bank decisions next month.

title: Rate Hikes Wouldn't Put Brakes on Japan's Economy, BOJ's Ueda Says
description:
By Megumi Fujikawa

The Bank of Japan will thoroughly discuss the possibility of an interest-rate increase at its upcoming meeting, Gov. Kazuo Ueda said, stoking hopes that it could resume monetary tightening this year.

title: Japan Identifies Food Tech Priority Sector in Upcoming National Growth Strategy
description:
4 Mins Read

title: Japan's cabinet approves lavish stimulus as markets fret over Takaichi's fiscal policy
description:
Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s cabinet approved a ¥21.3 trillion ($135.40 billion) economic stimulus package on Friday (November 21, 2025), marking the first major policy initiative under the new leader, who has pledged to pursue expansionary fiscal measures.

title: Japan PM Takaichi’s personal touch on social media draws bouquets, brickbats
description:

title: Japan GDP Down Annualized 1.8% in July-Sept.
description:
Yomiuri Shimbun file photo

The Bank of Japan

TOKYO — Japan’s gross domestic product in July-September shrank at an annualized rate of 1.8% after price and seasonal adjustment, contracting for the first time in six quarters, the Cabinet Office said in a preliminary report Monday.

title: GDP Contraction: Overseas Risks Should Be Assessed Carefully
description:

title: Crypto News: Robert Kiyosaki Warns Japan Ending Carry Trade May Crash Global Markets
description:
Robert Kiyosaki warns Japan’s carry trade end may trigger a global crash and urges investment in energy, metals, Bitcoin, and Ethereum.
